text: Hi guys, i'm new to HubSpot. We want to integrate HubSpot's analytics/events api with our React Native app but i can't find such thing in the docs. Is this possible please?
I only read that it can be used in JS frontend frameworks but nothing on React Native
I'd love to know if there's anyway i can achieve this with HubSpot just like how we can send mobile events with Mixpanel, we want to do the same with HubSpot
And also, i can't find "behavioral events" here or how to create an event even though the documentation says it's in Reports > Analytics tool. Please help

Hi all, i am new in HubSpot development and I have issues loading javascript files to my template. I have custom js  for carosel owl and slick but i cant get them running. is there any particular guide for this? where should i link the js files in my template? thanks!
not at the moment, i have plain html css js site that i need to transform it to HubSpot template
do i need to create a module for that?
you are going to have to break stuff up into modular components.
you can upload the file into the file manager or into the dm directly.
so every section that i need to use js, i make it a module?
no .. you can make a global file.
if you look up the HubSpot boilerplate theme and look through it

i get the picture now. thank you very much! one more question about the use of owl carosel, slick etc.. i use alot of jquery. will that be a problem or i need to reqrite the jquery to vanila javascript?

Hi guys, please i need help. I created a custom worklow action via the api but i can't see it when i try to create a new workflow. It got successfully added and `published`. is set to true also. ' Please help
